title: Hand drawn-ish Child font
content:
Trying to get some vinyl stickers reprinted and can't recognize this guy, any insight is greatly appreciated.

comments.content: Looks like it could be [Cheri](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054819/http:/www.fontspace.com/font-a-licious/cheri) (free font, personal use only).
